section.title: How To Use
section.para: This section explains not yet in detail the use of the Java Rule Engine API with the implementation for JBoss Rules.

section.title: J2SE Environment
section.para: This section shows you, how to use JBoss Rules over the Java Rule Engine API in your java applications.

section.title: J2EE Environment
section.para: If you are using JBoss Rules in a container managed environment, you might want to use it as a service. This section presents, how to use the rule engine with the JNDI (Java Naming and Directory Interface) or using it inside of an enterprise application such as web archive (WAR), java archive (JAR) or enterprise archive (EAR), which is deployed into the server.
